ImageContainer.aboutUs: We are a platform that seeks to connect clinical patients with doctors in various medical specialties and pharmacies all over the Emirates.

confirmEmail.head: Confirm Email
confirmEmail.resendQuest: We’re send a password recover, So please chick your email inbox and click on the provided link to reset your password. If you don’t receive email, OR

main: We are a platform that seeks to connect clinical patients with doctors in various medical specialties and pharmacies all over the Emirates, So it has the following features:

info.title: Locate the patient to the nearest delivery service.
info.desc: We can determine the patient's location and determine the nearest service to him, so that it is easy and convenient for him to access the service

info.title: Contain Cloud payments.
info.desc: We have developed an electronic payment feature that makes it easier for the patient to pay money for the services provided to him via the Internet.

info.title: Filter depending on the current location.
info.desc: We filtered all services close to the patient and vice versa

Services.discrption: We seek the best ways for your comfort, so we tried to put in your hands our best services in a smooth and comfortable manner

testimonals.testimonal: I've been using this site since it came out! I really like how simple and quick the services are, and I would love to have a discussion with you to explain why and how we provide the service. Thank you for the great work you do!

get_app.main_title: Let ‘s Strive For a More happy Life With Med - Sal
get_app.descrption: This is achieved through access to your treatment and service faster and smoother than before.
